TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_DIALOG.TITLE: Transfer Product Stock
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: This feature offers a way for the user to transfer or convert stocks from one product unit to another. User can specify the number of units to be transfered and the product where to transfer the stocks to.

TRANSFER_PRODUCT_TYPE_CONTROL.LABEL: Select type of product unit transfer

NUMBER_OF_UNITS_CONTROL.LABEL: Specify quantity per __PRODUCT_UNIT__
NUMBER_OF_UNITS_CONTROL.HINT: This value specifies how many items does the product unit can contain. For example, a box can contains 10 pieces of items.

PRODUCT_DESTINATION_CONTROL.LABEL: Select product to transfer stocks to
PRODUCT_DESTINATION_CONTROL.HINT: Choose product where you want to transfer stocks to. Take note that this only contains the same product name with the source product but with different unit.

NUMBER_OF_STOCKS_TO_BE_TRANSFERED_CONTRO.LABEL: Specify number of __PRODUCT_UNIT__ to be transfered
NUMBER_OF_STOCKS_TO_BE_TRANSFERED_CONTRO.HINT: This value indicates how many units of the source product the user would like to transfer.

NUMBER_OF_UNITS_CONTROL.LABEL: Quantity per __PRODUCT_UNIT__
NUMBER_OF_UNITS_CONTROL.HINT: This value specifies how many items does the product unit can contain. For example, a box can contains 10 pieces of items.

PRODUCT_DESTINATION_CONTROL.LABEL: Select product to transfer stocks to
PRODUCT_DESTINATION_CONTROL.HINT: Choose product where you want to transfer stocks to. Take note that this only contains the same product name with the source product but with different unit.

NUMBER_OF_STOCKS_TO_BE_TRANSFERED_CONTRO.LABEL: Specify number of __PRODUCT_UNIT__ to be transfered
NUMBER_OF_STOCKS_TO_BE_TRANSFERED_CONTRO.HINT: This value indicates how many units of the source product the user would like to transfer.

TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_CONFIRMATION_DIAL.TITLE: Transfer Product Stock
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_CONFIRMATION_DIAL.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You are about to transfer stocks from __SOURCE_PRODUCT__ to __DESTINATION_PRODUCT__. This action cannot be reverted. Do you still want to proceed?
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_CONFIRMATION_DIAL.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Product stocks have been successfully transferred.
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_CONFIRMATION_DIAL.ERROR_MESSAGE: Transferring product stocks failed. Please again later.

TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_INVALID_DIALOG.TITLE: Invalid quantity to be transfered
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_INVALID_DIALOG.QUANTITY_LESS_THAN_ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to proceed. The quantity to be transfered must be greater than or equal to the 'Quantity per unit' of the destination product.
TRANSFER_PRODUCT_STOCK_INVALID_DIALOG.QUANTITY_INDIVISIBLE_ERROR_MESSAGE: Unable to proceed. The quantity must be perfectly divisible by the 'Quantity per unit' in the destination product.

TEXT_ORDER_DIALOG.TITLE: Text Order
TEXT_ORDER_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: This feature offers a much faster way to set up orders especially when you have a large number of items. You can set up orders by typing in texts following the format below. Type @ to search for product that you are looking for:

CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm Orders
CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You have active orders that are not yet saved. Proceeding with this action will override active orders. Do you still want to proceed?

TEXT_INVENTORIES_DIALOG.TITLE: Text Inventories
TEXT_INVENTORIES_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: This feature offers a much faster way to set update product details especially when you have a large number of products. Type @ to search for product that you are looking for:

CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm Update on Inventories
CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: You are about to update product inventories for the following product items. This action cannot be undone. Do you still want to proceed?
CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Product inventories has been successfully updated!
CONFIRM_ORDERS_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating product inventories failed. Please again later.

REPORTS_PAGE.TITLE: Reports
REPORTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This page contains the list of different type of reports that user can use for data analysis.

REPORTS_INFORMATION.DAILY_SUMMARIZE_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT_DESC: Summary and quick insights for daily confirmed transactions
REPORTS_INFORMATION.DAILY_DETAILED_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT_DESC: Itemized details for confirmed transactions on a specific date, facilitating a focused analysis of each purchase.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.ENDING_INVENTORY_PER_PRODUCT_REPORT_DESC: Displays starting and ending stock for a given date, aiding administrators in analyzing initial load and remaining stock from sales agents account.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.ENDING_INVENTORY_PER_PRODUCT_REPORT_ADMI: Displays starting and ending stock for a given date, aiding administrators in analyzing initial load and remaining stock from warehouse.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.SALES_PER_CUSTOMER_REPORT_DESC: Generates sales data per customer for a specified date, aiding administrators in analyzing and gaining insights into individual customer sales.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.PRODUCT_WITHDRAWAL_REPORT_DESC: This report can generate the product withdrawal on a given date. This can help administrators to analyze the product withdrawal per sales agent on a given date.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.PRODUCT_WITHDRAWAL_REPORT_DESC_2: This report can generate the product withdrawal on a given date. This can help administrators to analyze the product withdrawal per sales agent on a given date.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.CUSTOMER_DETAILED_TRANSACTIONS_REPORT_DE: This report can generate the detailed transactions of customers on a given date. Each transactions are generated per sheet.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.SALES_AGENT_COLLECTION_SUMMARY_REPORT_DE: This type of report can generate collection summary per sales agent on a given date.
REPORTS_INFORMATION.CUSTOMER_COLLECTION_SUMMARY_REPORT_DESC: This type of report can generate collection summary per customer on a given date.

WAREHOUSE_PAGE.TITLE: Warehouse
WAREHOUSE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is the page where administrator manages products from warehouse.

WAREHOUSE_PRODUCT_IMPORT_PAGE.TITLE: Product Import
WAREHOUSE_PRODUCT_IMPORT_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Use this page to import product data from excel file. Follow the steps below to proceed.

FIRST_STEP_SECTION.TITLE: Select file

IMPORT_MECHANICS_INFORMATION_TEXTS.LABEL_1: Select an excel file (.xlsx) to extract products information that you want to import in Bizual. File must only contain a maximum of 1000 data rows.
IMPORT_MECHANICS_INFORMATION_TEXTS.LABEL_2: The file must also follow the column format below, otherwise it won't be able to read properly the content of the file.
IMPORT_MECHANICS_INFORMATION_TEXTS.LABEL_3: If the code does not exists in Bizual, this will automatically create a new entry of the product in Bizual.
IMPORT_MECHANICS_INFORMATION_TEXTS.LABEL_4: If the already exists, then it will try to update the item if there are new changes.

FIRST_STEP_SECTION.EXTRACT_PROCESS_TEXT: Extracting products. This might take some time depending on the number of products. Please wait...

FAILED_PRODUCTS_EXTRACTED_SECTION.ERROR_BANNER_TEXT: {0} Error(s) found. Note that you cannot proceed with the import if there are any errors. Please check and fix the result below.

TABLE_RESULT_SECTION.TITLE: Error(s)
TABLE_RESULT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Extracted product information with problems. Please make sure that the data are correct.

TABLE_RESULT_SECTION.TITLE: Extracted Product(s)
TABLE_RESULT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Extracted products from the uploaded excel files. Extracted product(s) here will be part of the import process.

BANNER_INFO_SECTION.LABEL_1: To proceed with the importing of products, click the Import button below. This may take some time to process depending on the number of products so refrain from reloading or switching to other pages while the process is on going to avoid any issues. If you wish to abort the process just press Cancel button below.
BANNER_INFO_SECTION.LABEL_2: NOTE: This action cannot be reverted, so make sure to check if the data you are importing is correct.

BANNER_IMPORT_IN_PROGRESS_SECTION.LABEL_1: Product import is in progress. Importing {0} product(s). Please wait..

SUCCESS_IMPORT_DIALOG.TEXT: Products have been imported successfully. Go to the product list to see them.

EXTENSION_ERROR_DIALOG.TITLE: Invalid file extension
EXTENSION_ERROR_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Importing products only support .xlsx file type. Please select another file.

SELECT_ERROR_DIALOG.TITLE: Unable to select file
SELECT_ERROR_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Please remove current file before selecting new one.

ABORT_IMPORT_DIALOG.TEXT: Import process has been aborted. No products have been added or updated.

RESET_IMPORT_DIALOG.TITLE: Reset import
RESET_IMPORT_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Resetting import setup will remove the uploaded file and remove the extracted products as well. Are you sure you want to proceed?

NEW_ACCOUNT_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: New user account has been saved!
NEW_ACCOUNT_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating details failed. Please again later.

INVALID_FORM_DIALOG.TITLE: There is error(s) in the form. Please fix the error(s) and saving again.

MANAGE_PRODUCT_STOCK_AUDITS_PAGE.TITLE: Product Stock Audit
MANAGE_PRODUCT_STOCK_AUDITS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is where product stock audit information can be managed.

REPORT_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CONTRO.LABEL: Report Notification Email Address
REPORT_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CONTRO.HINT: Specify email address to send report to.

CONFIRMATION_REPORT_SETTINGS_DIALOG.TITLE: Update Report Settings
CONFIRMATION_REPORT_SETTINGS_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to update report settings?
CONFIRMATION_REPORT_SETTINGS_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Updating report settings failed. Please again later.

SETTINGS_PAGE.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Manage general settings for the application. Here you can change report notification email address, user account details, and more.

ORDER_TRANSACTION_SETTINGS_SUBPAGE.TITLE: Order Transaction Settings
ORDER_TRANSACTION_SETTINGS_SUBPAGE.DESCRIPTION: Manage settings related with order transaction module. Here you can configure sending of receipt for each order transaction, and more.

ALLOW_SEND_RECEIPT_CONTROL.LABEL: Send Invoice Receipt
ALLOW_SEND_RECEIPT_CONTROL.HINT: Activate if you want to send invoice receipt.

ALLOW_AUTO_SEND_RECEIPT_CONTROL.LABEL: Auto Send Invoice Receipt
ALLOW_AUTO_SEND_RECEIPT_CONTROL.HINT: Activate if you want to automatically send invoice receipt when confirming order transaction.

SEND_RECEIPT_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CONTROL.LABEL: Invoice Receipt Email Address
SEND_RECEIPT_EMAIL_ADDRESS_CONTROL.HINT: Specify email address to send invoice receipt.

REPORTS_SETTINGS_SUBPAGE.TITLE: Report Settings
REPORTS_SETTINGS_SUBPAGE.DESCRIPTION: Manage settings related with report module. Here you can configure generating of reports.

SAVE_SETTINGS_DIALOG.TITLE: Save changes
SAVE_SETTINGS_DIALOG.CONFIRM: Are you sure to save new changes?
SAVE_SETTINGS_DIALOG.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: New updates have been sucessfully saved!
SAVE_SETTINGS_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to save settings. Please try again later!

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Dashboard
HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This shows the total distribution of sales based on the date filer settings. The chart below shows the distribution of sales based on the date filter settings.

DISTRIBUTION_PAGE.TITLE: Distribution
DISTRIBUTION_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This page gives insights about the sales and current state of the sales agents product distribution.

PRODUCT_LIST_CONTAINER.TITLE: Product List
PRODUCT_LIST_CONTAINER.DESCRIPTION: The list below shows the available products assigned to the selected sales agent.

PRODUCT_STOCK_AUDIT_LIST_CONTAINER.TITLE: Product Stock Audit
PRODUCT_STOCK_AUDIT_LIST_CONTAINER.DESCRIPTION: The list below shows the product stock audit data for the selected product on the left panel.

INSIGHTS_PAGE.TITLE: Insights
INSIGHTS_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This page gives administrator insights about the most frequently sold products.

INFO_BANNER.TITLE: Click on store to see top products sold.
INFO_BANNER.TITLE_2: Click back button to see top store sales.
